text: Lyudi byli odnoy obshchinoy, i poslal Allakh prorokov vestnikami i uveshchatelyami i nisposlal s nimi pisaniye s istinoy, chtoby rassudit' mezhdu lyud'mi v tom, v chem oni razoshlis'. A razoshlis' tol'ko te, kotorym ona byla darovana, posle togo kak prishli k nim yasnyye znameniya, po zlobe mezhdu soboy. I Allakh vyvel tekh, kotoryye uverovali, k toy istine, otnositel'no kotoroy oni razoshlis' po yego dozvoleniyu. Allakh vedet, kogo pozhelayet, k pryamoy doroge
